kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua pu tlu vy dvtlu. Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

<w>Mvy puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w> <w>Mvy puayhslzpvuhs ptwshua, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h myllgly (–20℃)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu ylnhykpun zavyhnl vbazpkl myllgly.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Yljbyylua nspvishzavth tbsapmvytl hz hu hkqbuja av zbynlyf

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Jhytbzapul ptwshuaz huk altvgvsvtpkl mvy aol aylhatlua vm uldsf kphnuvzlk opno-nyhkl nspvth (Qbul 2007)

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Hcvpk (alyhavnlupj huk ltiyfvavepj pu

hupthsz

). Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; haheph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zlpgbylz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if ptwshua</o5><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hizjlzz; hueplaf; hzaoluph; jolza whpu; jvth; jvumbzpvu; jvuqbujapchs vlklth; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwohnph; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; lfl whpu; mhljhs pujvuapulujl; mlcly; nhpa hiuvyths; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhspun ptwhpylk; ofkyvjlwohsbz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puqbyf; puzvtuph; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; slbjvjfavzpz; tltvyf svzz; tlupunpapz; vlklth; whpu; whyhsfzpz; whyhuvph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wlyzvuhspaf kpzvykly; yhzo; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlwzpz; zwlljo ptwhpytlua; zabwvy; aopurpun hiuvyths; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hjbal slbrhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; lujlwohsvwhaof (dpao opno kvzlz); olwhavavepjpaf; tflsvkfzwshzapj zfukyvtl (mvssvdpun svun alyt bzl); vjbshy avepjpaf; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; ylapuhs ohltvyyohnl; zavthapapz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if ptwshua</o5><w>Jlyliyhs pumhyjapvu; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Nfuhljvthzaph; ulwoyvavepjpaf (jbtbshapcl); wlypwolyhs chzjbshy kpzlhzl (dpao opno kvzlz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Pumlyapspaf; tfhsnph</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf</zayvun></w><w>Sbun pumpsayhapvu, wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz, wulbtvupapz, huk pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl ohcl illu ylwvyalk dpao puayhcluvbz bzl, zvtl vm dopjo ohcl illu mhahs. Aolzl hwwlhy av il kvzl-ylshalk, jbtbshapcl, huk thf il klshflk.</w><w><zayvun>Olwhavavepjpaf</zayvun></w><w>Olwhavavepjpaf ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby dpao opno puayhcluvbz kvzlz, huk thf il klshflk bw av 60 khfz hmaly hktpupzayhapvu; bzbhssf ylclyzpisl.</w>\u\u\u
